about_the_game: Delta- This is a dynamic first-person melee action game set in an abandoned space station. You will have to fight with hordes of alien creatures using sword and other weapons of the arsenal. Thanks to the parkour system and special skills, you can plan yourself how and from where to deliver a fatal blow. Explore half-destroyed rooms, shred enemies to pieces, compete with other players records. And free Delta Station from invasion.

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes of violence, murder, and blood.

detailed_description: Delta- This is a dynamic first-person melee action game set in an abandoned space station. Explore half-destroyed rooms, shred enemies to pieces, compete with other players records. And free Delta Station from invasion.

short_description: Dynamic and colorful first-person battles with alien creatures, spectacular parkour, exploration of mysterious locations in the atmosphere of space science fiction. Become a ruthless killing machine and free Delta Station from the invasion.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
